# reduceMetrics

**Type Property**

An option specifying that views should reduce their internal metrics.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying class var reduceMetrics: NSUserInterfaceCompressionOptions { get }
```

## Discussion

Use this compression option to reduce the padding in system controls.

## Creating standard options

- **hideImages**: An option specifying that views should hide their images.
- **hideText**: An option specifying that views should hide their text.
- **breakEqualWidths**: An option specifying that views should no longer maintain equal width constraints.
- **standardOptions**: An option that represents the union of all standard compression options.
